indrani bogoda (3)

warthamana thaththwaya saha pradeshaye sanwardhana katayuthu pilibandawa soya balima sandaha wasara 21 kata pasuwa rajaye amathiwarayaku delf dupathata yayi.1990 warshayedi ewakata aarakshaka amathiwarayawa siti ranjan wijerathna mahatha ema dupathata giya pasuwa aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha ema pethihasika awasthawata ek wiya.delf dupathe podu pahasukam siyalla nanwima sandaha awashya piyawara gath amathiwaraya me wana wita kriyathmaka karana lada wyapruthi kihipayak janatha ayithiyata path kirimata da piyawara gaththeya.yapanaya ardhadwipayen kilomitar 46 k pamana durin pihiti delf dupathe ada wana wita wasaya karana janagahanaya 5000 k pamana bawa aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya pawasayi.mangi prawahana sewaya sandaha landesi samaye idikala parani jatiya mitar 200 k dakwa pulul kirima ha mitar dekak gambauru kara sanwardhanaya kirima da mehidi aarambha karana lada athara eeta wen kara thibena mudala rupiyal miliyana 9 ki.mita amatharawa prawahana pahasukam diyunu kirimata da amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha piyawara gaththeya.ema dupathe wesena janathawa samanga suhada pilisandaraka nirathawu aarthika sanwardhana amathiwaraya owunge gatalu pilibandawa da purna awadhanaya yomu kaleya.me dupathe wesena janathawata pawathi pradhanathama gataluwa lesa prawahana pahasukama handuna gath basil rajapaksha mahatha ee sandaha aasana siyayakin samanwitha wishala pramanaye bottuwak kolambaa dokyad aayathanayen laba gena owunata bharadimata katayuthu yoda atha..
